description: Green velvet chairs and sofas are scattered throughout a huge hall with a small stage at one end and an immense carved granite fireplace at the other.  Arches allow a cool night breeze into the room, while trees of polished petrified wood support a grand crystal-domed roof.  A waterfall bubbles into a small rounded pool in the center of the room.  Trophy cases line the wall opposite the arches and an antique bar fills a corner near the fire.
title: [Hall of the Dragon]
